trans-unit.source: Supports a trigger action that resumes a paused <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 支援的觸發程序動作，繼續已暫停<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use this class with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to resume a paused <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別搭配使用<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>或<xref:System.Windows.Trigger>若要繼續暫停的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: A ResumeStoryboard object can only resume a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> that is paused and has no effect on a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> in any other state.
trans-unit.target: 只能繼續 ResumeStoryboard 物件<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>已暫停，而且對<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>在任何其他狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, ResumeStoryboard, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要暫停、 繼續或控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>，以互動方式設定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>屬性其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>並用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>物件 (例如<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>，ResumeStoryboard，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) 來控制參考其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> cannot be interactively controlled after it starts.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>並未指定，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>無法在啟動後以互動方式控制。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 使用事件觸發程序來控制分鏡腳本之後啟動](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard"></xref>類別。
